author: sky.cactus
content: Has the Ethereum.org Twitter handle been compromised?  It seems to be shilling some centralized chain (that is actively censoring its own users).  I'm very confused as that handle normally doesn't say much other than announcements and stuff, and now all of a sudden I have several shill retweets in my feed from it.

author: _shemnon
content: No - https://x.com/ethereumfndn/status/1878805342190252476 - But I understand there are parts of the ecosystem that engage in practices you don't approve of.  I expect that https://x.com/ethereumfndn would probably be the analogue of the pre-2025 @etheruem x handle, so for some of us we will be updating our follow lists, either to add or to swap.
